instruction: What is the Admin Body in the category of Legal Framework?

instruction: What is the Standard Rate in the category of Corporate Income Tax?
output: CIT raised from 15% to 20% (Rate/Value: 20%, Effective Date: 2024-01-01, Source: lucapacioli.com.tn)

instruction: What is the High-Tax Sector Rate in the category of Corporate Income Tax?
output: Banks, insurance, financial institutions (Rate/Value: 40%, Effective Date: 2024-01-01, Source: investmentpolicy.unctad.org)

instruction: What is the Reduced Rates in the category of Corporate Income Tax?
output: SMEs, agriculture, crafts, free-zones (Rate/Value: 10%, Effective Date: Ongoing, Source: PwC Tax Summaries)

instruction: What is the Minimum Tax in the category of Corporate Income Tax?
output: If CIT is below threshold, applies to turnover (Rate/Value: 0.2% (or 0.1% for 10% companies), Effective Date: Ongoing, Source: tobias-nielsen.com)

instruction: What is the Minimum Tax - Floor in the category of Corporate Income Tax?
output: Minimum floor for CIT (Rate/Value: TND 500 or TND 300, Effective Date: Ongoing, Source: tobias-nielsen.com)

instruction: What is the Conjunctural Contribution in the category of Corporate Income Tax?

instruction: What is the New Investment Exemption in the category of Incentives?

instruction: What is the Export Companies in the category of Incentives?

instruction: What is the PIT Bracket 1 in the category of Personal Income Tax?

instruction: What is the PIT Bracket 2 in the category of Personal Income Tax?
output: 5,001 – 20,000 TND (Rate/Value: 26% + SSC 0.5%, Effective Date: 2025-01-01, Source: PwC Tax Summaries)

instruction: What is the PIT Bracket 3 in the category of Personal Income Tax?

instruction: What is the PIT Bracket 4 in the category of Personal Income Tax?

instruction: What is the Flat PIT in the category of Non-Resident Tax?
